++ Downloads

Gnome Scan should be installable through your distribution.

The latest tarball can always be found at the [./download download page] !

++ Feedbacks

Bugs must be reported to the [http://bugzilla.gnome.org/ Gnome Bug Tracking System].

Please send debug output when you [http://bugzilla.gnome.org/simple-bug-guide.cgi?product=gnome-scan report a new bug in Gnome Scan].
